commenter_a: I am ever in awe at the things they do at the Clinic. However, I have to wonder at the ethics. Performing a surgery that has major repercussions for the woman involved (anti-rejection meds, etc...) just so she can undergo pregnancy- which has its own set of dangers - seems ethically sketchy. There are so many unwanted children who need homes. Adopt.
